languages.text: "Если бы я запирался в храме — разве успел бы вмешаться в расправу над твоими подданными с Кьявы Гамма? Нет, истина живет не под золотыми сводами, а здесь, на площади, среди людей. Под золотыми сводами живет нечто иное, куда более грязное".

traits.locale_text: "Если бы я запирался в храме — разве успел бы вмешаться в расправу над твоими подданными с Кьявы Гамма? Нет, истина живет не под золотыми сводами, а здесь, на площади, среди людей. Под золотыми сводами живет нечто иное, куда более грязное".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple, would I have made it in time to intervene in the massacre of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."
languages.original_text: "Если бы я запирался в храме — разве успел бы вмешаться в расправу над твоими подданными с Кьявы Гамма? Нет, истина живет не под золотыми сводами, а здесь, на площади, среди людей. Под золотыми сводами живет нечто иное, куда более грязное".

traits.locale_text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple — would I have made it in time to intervene in the lynching of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in a square, among people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."

traits.locale_text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple, would I have made it in time to intervene in the massacre of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple, would I have made it in time to intervene in the massacre of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “假如我真的习惯于把自己关在神殿之中，当你准备屠杀基亚瓦伽马星的臣民时，我会及时赶到吗？不，真理并不在金碧辉煌的大厅里，而是在这里，在广场上，在民众之间。金碧辉煌的大厅，只适合容纳其他更加肮脏的东西。”
languages.original_text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple, would I have made it in time to intervene in the massacre of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."

traits.locale_text: “假如我真的习惯于把自己关在神殿之中，当你准备屠杀基亚瓦伽马星的臣民时，我会及时赶到吗？不，真理并不在金碧辉煌的大厅里，而是在这里，在广场上，在民众之间。金碧辉煌的大厅，只适合容纳其他更加肮脏的东西。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Si tuviera el hábito de encerrarme en un templo, ¿cree que habría llegado a tiempo para impedir la masacre de sus súbditos en Kiava Gamma? No, la realidad no reside en pasillos de oro, sino aquí, en la plaza, entre la gente. Los pasillos dorados hospedan a otros seres infinitamente más inmundos».
languages.original_text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple, would I have made it in time to intervene in the massacre of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."

traits.locale_text: «Si tuviera el hábito de encerrarme en un templo, ¿cree que habría llegado a tiempo para impedir la masacre de sus súbditos en Kiava Gamma? No, la realidad no reside en pasillos de oro, sino aquí, en la plaza, entre la gente. Los pasillos dorados hospedan a otros seres infinitamente más inmundos».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「もし私が寺院に閉じこもる習慣があったなら、キアヴァ・ガンマから来たあなたの臣下たちの虐殺に介入するのに間に合ったでしょうか？いや、真実とは黄金の回廊ではなく、人々が集うこの広場に存在するのです。黄金の回廊は、より不潔な者たちがたむろする場所です」
languages.original_text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple, would I have made it in time to intervene in the massacre of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."

traits.locale_text: 「もし私が寺院に閉じこもる習慣があったなら、キアヴァ・ガンマから来たあなたの臣下たちの虐殺に介入するのに間に合ったでしょうか？いや、真実とは黄金の回廊ではなく、人々が集うこの広場に存在するのです。黄金の回廊は、より不潔な者たちがたむろする場所です」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Hätte ich die Angewohnheit, mich in einem Tempel einzuschließen, hätte ich dann rechtzeitig bei dem Massaker an Euren Untertanen von Kiava Gamma eingreifen können? Nein, denn die Wahrheit wohnt nicht in goldenen Hallen, sondern hier auf dem Platz, bei den Leuten. In goldenen Hallen residieren andere, weitaus schmutzigere Dinge."
languages.original_text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple, would I have made it in time to intervene in the massacre of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."

traits.locale_text: "Hätte ich die Angewohnheit, mich in einem Tempel einzuschließen, hätte ich dann rechtzeitig bei dem Massaker an Euren Untertanen von Kiava Gamma eingreifen können? Nein, denn die Wahrheit wohnt nicht in goldenen Hallen, sondern hier auf dem Platz, bei den Leuten. In goldenen Hallen residieren andere, weitaus schmutzigere Dinge."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Si j'avais pour habitude de m'enfermer dans un temple, aurais-je pu intervenir à temps lors du massacre de vos sujets de Kiava Gamma ? Non, ce n'est pas dans des salles dorées qu'on trouve la vérité, mais ici, sur la place publique, au milieu des gens. Les salles dorées hébergent des choses bien plus ignobles. »
languages.original_text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple, would I have made it in time to intervene in the massacre of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'avais pour habitude de m'enfermer dans un temple, aurais-je pu intervenir à temps lors du massacre de vos sujets de Kiava Gamma ? Non, ce n'est pas dans des salles dorées qu'on trouve la vérité, mais ici, sur la place publique, au milieu des gens. Les salles dorées hébergent des choses bien plus ignobles. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Kendimi tapınağa kapatma gibi bir huyum olsaydı, vaktinde yetişip Kiava Gama'dan gelen tebaanın katlini durdurabilir miydim? Hayır. Hakikat, altından salonlarda ikamet etmez; burada, meydanlarda, halkın arasındadır. Altından salonlar bambaşka, çok daha pis şeylerin yuvasıdır."
languages.original_text: "If I were in the habit of locking myself in a temple, would I have made it in time to intervene in the massacre of your subjects from Kiava Gamma? No, truth resides not in golden halls, but here, in the square, among the people. Golden halls are home to other, far filthier things."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer kendimi bir tapınağa kapatma gibi bir alışkanlığım olsaydı Kiava Gama'daki tebaalarının katlini zamanında yetişip durdurabilir miydim? Hayır, gerçeklik, altından salonlarda ikâmet etmez; burada, meydanlarda, halkın arasındadır. Altından salonlar başka şeylerin, çok daha kirli şeylerin yuvasıdır."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
